resource.description: Associates a set of DHCP options with a VPC, or associates no DHCP options with the VPC.

properties.name: DhcpOptionsId
properties.description: The ID of the DHCP options set, or default to associate no DHCP options with the VPC.

type.description: The ID of the DHCP options set, or default to associate no DHCP options with the VPC.
